Yggdrasil walks just besides Devilcat.

Yggdrasil: What are your intentions now?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "I doubt they've had much time to gather data on us directly, but our 
> reputation precedes us.  Our ship is a distinctive one and has been 
> connected officially with dozens of terrorist acts, including the 
> destruction of some important Tripredacus outposts."
> 
> Devilcat considers for a moment.  Activating his comlink, he issues a 
> command to the Rogues: "Everyone meet me in the command center - 
> stat!  We've got business to discuss."  He heads out of the room, 
> beckoning Yggdrasil and Jayde to follow him.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil came up near Devilcat and looked at the data displayed.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: That is a new ship design. Seems like a warship to me, 
> and
> > since it's new, they might well have lots more where they come from.
> > That means they're not alone. As for personel, I can't say much. 
> Never
> > fought Tripreds. But they might be elite, or they might be green
> > rookies that have been placed there to man the ship. However, 
> rookies
> > could not have landed the ship as successfully as they just did. 
> There
> > is something else. The survivors of the first group probably had 
> time
> > to observe things here and I am convinced that they have gathered 
> some
> > intelligence on most people here. The newcomers now have that edge. 
> A
> > frontal assault is totally out of question.
